component.source: <project> <include file="cogkit.xml"/> <echo message="==================="/> <echo message="ENVIRONMENT TEST "/> <echo message="==================="/> <ignoreErrors> <task:execute executable="/usr/bin/env" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="/usr/bin/hostname" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="/usr/bin/uname" arguments="-a" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="grid-proxy-info" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="/usr/bin/which" arguments="java" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="java" arguments="-version" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="/usr/bin/which" arguments="ant" provider="local" redirect="true"/> <task:execute executable="ant" arguments="-version" provider="local" redirect="true"/> </ignoreErrors> <echo message="==================="/> </project>
